data.name: Rick Henderson Demo
data.detailed_description:
Windows only demo!


Demo contains:
  • 30+ enemy types
  • 14 weapons
  • 4 levels
  • 4 bosses
  • Random events
  • Basic scoring system

Demo does not contain:
  • Steam Cloud support
  • Full Controller support
  • Full scoring system
  • Perks
  • Achievements
  • Leaderboards

Known issues:

  • Indicator that the enemies are coming from behind is not yet implemented completely
  • Rippers reaccelerate on pause
  • Sound does not change volume gradually on pause menu and death menu
  • Occasional instantiation hiccups due to pooling system not completely implemented

data.short_description: Rick Henderson is an endless horizontal-scrolling shoot 'em up with infinite replayability, a true homage to 16-bit shooters wrapped in graphics we all loved. Twitch your fingers through five enemy factions and their bosses, upgrade your ship and try to survive through unpredictable space events.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7
  • Processor: 1,4 Ghz or faster
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any integrated should suffice
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Not Required
